RxJava: Functional Reactive Programming on the JVM

Package rx.plugins

Class Summary
RxJavaDefaultSchedulers Define alternate Scheduler implementations to be returned by the Schedulers factory methods.
RxJavaErrorHandler Abstract class for defining error handling logic in addition to the normal Observer.onError(Throwable) behavior.
RxJavaObservableExecutionHook Abstract ExecutionHook with invocations at different lifecycle points of Observable execution with a default no-op implementation.
RxJavaPlugins Registry for plugin implementations that allows global override and handles the retrieval of correct implementation based on order of precedence: plugin registered globally via register methods in this class plugin registered and retrieved using System.getProperty(String) (see get methods for property names) default implementation See the RxJava GitHub Wiki for more information: https://github.com/Netflix/RxJava/wiki/Plugins.
